Tool

NameCommit/Rollback Transaction
ID2
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2008

Description

Execute a commit or rollback on open transactions with ODBC source.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Options
DSNTextODBC_DSNData Source Name
UserTextODBC_USRUser Name
PasswordTextODBC_PWDPassword
ServerChoiceSERVERSAvailable Choices: [0] Default: 0
TransactionsChoiceTRANSACTAvailable Choices: [0] rollback [1] commit Default: 1
